function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of grant funding for research","Impact":"Limits the resources available for research and development of solutions","Mitigation":"Seek alternative sources of funding, such as private investment or industry partnerships","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Research team, institution","Owner":"Research team, institution"},{"Description":"Contagious disease transmission in smart working environments","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion among remote workers","Mitigation":"Enforce health and safety protocols for remote work, provide virtual health resources","Technologies":"Virtual health platforms, remote monitoring technologies","People":"Remote workers, employers","Owner":"Employers, health and safety teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate supervision in partial smart working","Impact":"Decreased oversight leading to potential health and safety risks","Mitigation":"Implement clear guidelines, regular check-ins, and remote monitoring systems","Technologies":"Remote monitoring technologies, communication platforms","People":"Remote workers, supervisors","Owner":"Employers, supervisors"}]}
